channel.title: What equipment do you use while you’re producing on Auxy?
channel.description: I was wondering what you’re ”set-up” is. I personally use an iPhone 8 and Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H9 headphones and that’s pretty much it. *edit* I also use a Samick piano to help think of melodies

item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
